entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:40 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 8:00 AM CDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets beginning this morning then changing to snow or ice pellets near noon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
